name: The Absence of Is
storyline: For the first time in human history, the living are able to make real attempts at studying the afterlife. Lead the first mission into this new frontier as a team of four researchers and scientists—are these visions just random neural firings, or are you really on your way to another world?
summary: The Absence of Is is a science-fiction game based on a novel of the same name by Jeffrey Klinicke.
